pkgmetadata.longdescription: Block Bootstrap Methods for Quantile Regression in Time Series // Implements moving-blocks bootstrap and extended tapered-blocks bootstrap, as well as smooth versions of each, for quantile regression in time series. This package accompanies the paper: Gregory, K. B., Lahiri, S. N., Nordman, D. J. (2018). A smooth block bootstrap for quantile regression with time series. The Annals of Statistics, 46(3), 1138-1166.
